ComicInfo.Summary: Prepare for the in-your-face horror event of 2024! Vampires have always fed on the lifeblood of innocent victims...but what if there were no sheep left in the stable? After a million-year long slumber, Dracula wakes up to find Earth (and humanity) fundamentally changed and enslaved by a vicious alien species. Faced with this strange new world, the lord of the vampires must adapt to a nightmarish existence...or perish alongside the remnants of the people he fed upon. It's a brand-new nightmare vision of horror that will have you on the edge of your seat!
ComicInfo.Notes: Info taken from Indicia, Preview World, AMP's site
